name: Pasta Primavera
ingredients: Pasta, Vegetables, Olive Oil, Garlic, Parmesan Cheese
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables in olive oil and garlic. Mix with pasta and add cheese.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Spices, Tomato Sauce, Cream
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook in sauce until done.

name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Cocoa Powder, Eggs, Butter
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Lettuce, Croutons, Caesar Dressing, Parmesan Cheese
instructions: Toss all ingredients together and serve.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground Beef, Taco Shells, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese
instructions: Cook beef, fill taco shells, and top with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: Mixed Vegetables, Soy Sauce, Olive Oil, Garlic
instructions: Stir fry vegetables in olive oil and garlic, add soy sauce.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Mix fruits and drizzle with honey and lime juice.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Marinate salmon and grill until cooked through.

name: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, Milk, Eggs, Sugar, Baking Powder
instructions: Mix ingredients and cook on a skillet until golden brown.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Bacon, Parmesan Cheese, Black Pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti, mix with eggs and bacon, and serve with cheese.

name: Margarita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza Dough, Tomato Sauce, Mozzarella Cheese, Basil
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake at 475°F for 10-12 minutes.

name: Omelette
ingredients: Eggs, Cheese, Bell Peppers, Onions, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Beat eggs, pour into a skillet, add fillings, and cook until set.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: Beef, Mushrooms, Onion, Sour Cream, Egg Noodles
instructions: Cook beef and onions, add mushrooms, stir in sour cream, and serve over noodles.

name: Banana Bread
ingredients: Bananas, Flour, Sugar, Eggs, Baking Soda
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour into a loaf pan, and bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
ingredients: Shrimp, Rice, Peas, Carrots, Soy Sauce, Eggs
instructions: Stir fry shrimp and vegetables, add rice and soy sauce, and mix in scrambled eggs.
